metadata.title: SHOEBOY'S Velour Nubuck Care Waterproofing Spray, Black, 200 ML
features: Intensive waterproofing and color refreshment for suede and nubuck leathers. Available in a variety of colors.
Ideal for all colors and color combinations. Intensive color-refreshing effect or color activation.
Intensive care through high-value nutrients. Effective protection from wetness and dirt. Preserves breathability of TEX membranes. Protects the natural nap of rough leather.
For all raw leathers (suede and nubuck) and fabrics. Easy to apply, therefore ideal for leather clothing.
Active agents include color activator (neutral product for multicolored leathers), pigments (blue, brown, black), additives and nutrients, waterproofing agent & propellant.
description: Intensive waterproofing and color refreshment for suede and nubuck leathers. Available in a variety of colors.
